What will be the output of the following php code?
< ?php 
    $states = array("karnataka" => array
    ( "population" => "11,35,000", "captial" => "Bangalore"),
    "Tamil Nadu" => array( "population" => "17,90,000",
    "captial" => "Chennai") );
    echo  $states["karnataka"]["population"];
?>
